00030 XWaveNGraph::XWaveNGraph(const char *name, bool runtime, FrmGraphNURL *item)
00031   : XNode(name, runtime),
00032   m_btnDump(item->m_btnDump),
00033   m_graph(create<XGraph>(name, false)),
00034   m_dump(create<XNode>("Dump", true)),
00035   m_filename(create<XStringNode>("FileName", true))
00036 {
00037   item->m_graphwidget->setGraph(m_graph);
00038   m_conFilename = xqcon_create<XKURLReqConnector>(m_filename, item->m_url,
00039                       "*.dat|Data files (*.dat)\n*.*|All files (*.*)", true);
00040   m_conDump = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_dump, item->m_btnDump);
00041   init();
00042 }
00043 XWaveNGraph::XWaveNGraph(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00044         XQGraph *graphwidget, KUrlRequester *urlreq, QPushButton *btndump)
00045   : XNode(name, runtime),
00046   m_btnDump(btndump),
00047   m_graph(create<XGraph>(name, false)),
00048   m_dump(create<XNode>("Dump", true)),
00049   m_filename(create<XStringNode>("FileName", true))
00050 {
00051   graphwidget->setGraph(m_graph);
00052   m_conFilename = xqcon_create<XKURLReqConnector>(m_filename, urlreq,
00053                       "*.dat|Data files (*.dat)\n*.*|All files (*.*)", true);
00054   m_conDump = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_dump, btndump);
00055   init();
00056 }
00057 void
00058 XWaveNGraph::init()
00059 {
00060   m_lsnOnFilenameChanged = filename()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00061     shared_from_this(), &XWaveNGraph::onFilenameChanged);
00062   m_lsnOnIconChanged = m_tlkOnIconChanged.connectWeak(
00063     shared_from_this(), &XWaveNGraph::onIconChanged,
00064     XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL || XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00065     
00066   m_tlkOnIconChanged.talk(false);
00067   dump()->setUIEnabled(false);
00068   
00069   m_graph->persistence()->value(0.0);
00070   clearPlots();
00071 }
00072 XWaveNGraph::~XWaveNGraph()
00073 {
00074     m_stream.close();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void
00078 XWaveNGraph::clearPlots()
00079 {
00080   XScopedWriteLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex); {
00081       XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00082         for(std::deque<Plot>::iterator it = m_plots.begin(); it != m_plots.end(); it++) {
00083             m_graph->plots()->releaseChild(it->xyplot);
00084         }
00085       if(m_axisw) m_graph->axes()->releaseChild(m_axisw);
00086       if(m_axisz) m_graph->axes()->releaseChild(m_axisz);
00087       if(m_axisy2) m_graph->axes()->releaseChild(m_axisy2);
00088       if(m_axisx) m_axisx->label()->value("");
00089       if(m_axisy) m_axisy->label()->value("");
00090       m_plots.clear();
00091       m_axisy2.reset();
00092       m_axisz.reset();
00093       m_axisw.reset();
00094       m_colw = -1;
00095   }
00096 }
00097 void
00098 XWaveNGraph::insertPlot(const XString &label, int x, int y1, int y2, int weight, int z)
00099 {
00100     ASSERT( (y1 < 0) || (y2 < 0) );
00101   XScopedWriteLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00102   {  
00103     Plot plot;
00104       plot.colx = x;
00105       plot.coly1 = y1;
00106       plot.coly2 = y2;
00107       plot.colweight = weight;
00108       plot.colz = z;
00109       
00110       if(weight >= 0) {
00111         if((m_colw >= 0) && (m_colw != weight))
00112             m_colw = -1;
00113         else
00114             m_colw = weight;
00115       }
00116     
00117       XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00118         
00119      // m_graph->setName(getName());
00120       m_graph->label()->value(getLabel());
00121     
00122       unsigned int plotnum = m_plots.size() + 1;
00123       plot.xyplot = m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>(formatString("Plot%u", plotnum).c_str(),
00124          true, m_graph);
00125       plot.xyplot->label()->value(label);
00126     
00127       atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00128       m_axisx = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(0));
00129       m_axisy = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(1));
00130       plot.xyplot->axisX()->value(m_axisx);
00131       m_axisx->label()->value(m_labels[plot.colx]);
00132       if(plot.coly1 >= 0) {
00133           plot.xyplot->axisY()->value(m_axisy);
00134           m_axisy->label()->value(m_labels[plot.coly1]);
00135       }
00136       if(plot.colz >= 0) {
00137           if(!m_axisz)
00138             m_axisz = m_graph->axes()->create<XAxis>("Z Axis", true, XAxis::DirAxisZ, true, m_graph);
00139           plot.xyplot->axisZ()->value(m_axisz);
00140           m_axisz->label()->value(m_labels[plot.colz]);
00141       }
00142       if(plot.colweight >= 0) {
00143           if(!m_axisw) {
00144             m_axisw = m_graph->axes()->create<XAxis>("Weight", true, XAxis::AxisWeight, true, m_graph);
00145           }
00146           m_axisw->autoScale()->value(false);
00147           m_axisw->autoScale()->setUIEnabled(false);
00148           plot.xyplot->axisW()->value(m_axisw);
00149           m_axisw->label()->value(m_labels[plot.colweight]);
00150       }
00151       if(plot.coly2 >= 0)
00152         {
00153           if(!m_axisy2)
00154               m_axisy2 = m_graph->axes()->create<XAxis>("Y2 Axis", true, XAxis::DirAxisY, true, m_graph);
00155           plot.xyplot->axisY()->value(m_axisy2);
00156           m_axisy2->label()->value(m_labels[plot.coly2]);
00157         }
00158       plot.xyplot->maxCount()->value(rowCount());
00159       plot.xyplot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00160       plot.xyplot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00161       plot.xyplot->intensity()->value(1.0);
00162       if(m_plots.size()) {
00163           plot.xyplot->pointColor()->value(clGreen);
00164           plot.xyplot->lineColor()->value(clGreen);
00165           plot.xyplot->barColor()->value(clGreen);
00166           plot.xyplot->displayMajorGrid()->value(false);
00167         }
00168      
00169      m_plots.push_back(plot);
00170   }
00171 }
00172 
00173 void
00174 XWaveNGraph::setColCount(unsigned int n, const char **labels)
00175 {
00176   XScopedWriteLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00177   m_colcnt = n;
00178   m_labels.resize(m_colcnt);
00179   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00180     m_labels[i] = labels[i];
00181   }
00182 }
00183 void
00184 XWaveNGraph::setLabel(unsigned int col, const char *label)
00185 {
00186     m_labels[col] = label;
00187 }
00188 void
00189 XWaveNGraph::setRowCount(unsigned int n) {
00190   XScopedWriteLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00191   m_cols.resize(m_colcnt * n);
00192     for(std::deque<Plot>::iterator it = m_plots.begin(); it != m_plots.end(); it++) {
00193         it->xyplot->maxCount()->value(n);
00194     }
00195 }
00196 
00197 void
00198 XWaveNGraph::readLock() const
00199 {
00200     m_mutex.readLock();
00201 }
00202 void
00203 XWaveNGraph::readUnlock() const
00204 {
00205     m_mutex.readUnlock();
00206 }
00207 void
00208 XWaveNGraph::writeLock()
00209 {
00210   m_mutex.writeLock();
00211   m_graph->lock();
00212 }
00213 
00214 void
00215 XWaveNGraph::writeUnlock(bool updategraph)
00216 {
00217   if(updategraph) {
00218       m_mutex.writeUnlockNReadLock();
00219       drawGraph();
00220       m_graph->unlock();
00221       m_mutex.readUnlock();
00222     }
00223   else {
00224       m_graph->unlock();
00225       m_mutex.writeUnlock();
00226   }
00227 }

00229 void
00230 XWaveNGraph::onIconChanged(const bool &v)
00231 {
00232     KIconLoader *loader = KIconLoader::global();
00233     if(!v)
00234         m_btnDump->setIcon( loader->loadIcon("filesave",
00235                 KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) );
00236     else
00237         m_btnDump->setIcon( loader->loadIcon("redo",
00238                 KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) );
00239 }
00240 void
00241 XWaveNGraph::onFilenameChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00242 {
00243    {   XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_filemutex);
00244       
00245       if(m_stream.is_open()) m_stream.close();
00246       m_stream.clear();
00247       m_stream.open((const char*)QString(filename()->to_str().c_str()).toLocal8Bit().data(), OFSMODE);
00248     
00249       if(m_stream.good()) {
00250           m_lsnOnDumpTouched = dump()->onTouch().connectWeak(
00251             shared_from_this(), &XWaveNGraph::onDumpTouched);
00252           dump()->setUIEnabled(true);
00253       }
00254       else {
00255           m_lsnOnDumpTouched.reset();
00256           dump()->setUIEnabled(false);      
00257       }
00258       m_tlkOnIconChanged.talk(false);
00259   }
00260 }
00261 void
00262 XWaveNGraph::onDumpTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00263 {
00264   XScopedLock<XMutex> filelock(m_filemutex);
00265   if(m_stream.good()) {
00266     XScopedReadLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00267     
00268     m_stream << "#dumping...  "
00269         << (XTime::now()).getTimeFmtStr("%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S")
00270         << std::endl;
00271     m_stream << "#";
00272     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < colCount(); i++)
00273     {
00274             m_stream << m_labels[i] << " ";
00275     }
00276     m_stream << std::endl;
00277     
00278     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < rowCount(); i++)
00279     {
00280         if((m_colw < 0) || (cols(m_colw)[i] > 0)) {
00281             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < colCount(); j++)
00282             {
00283                 m_stream << cols(j)[i] << " ";
00284             }
00285             m_stream << std::endl;
00286         }
00287     }
00288     m_stream << std::endl;
00289     
00290     m_stream.flush();
00291 
00292     m_tlkOnIconChanged.talk(true);
00293   }
00294 }
00295 void
00296 XWaveNGraph::clear()
00297 {
00298   XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*this);
00299   setRowCount(0);
00300   { XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00301     for(std::deque<Plot>::iterator it = m_plots.begin(); it != m_plots.end(); it++) {
00302       it->xyplot->clearAllPoints();
00303     }
00304       m_graph->requestUpdate();
00305   }
00306 }
00307 void
00308 XWaveNGraph::drawGraph()
00309 {
00310   XScopedReadLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00311   {
00312       XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00313       
00314     for(std::deque<Plot>::iterator it = m_plots.begin(); it != m_plots.end(); it++) {        
00315       int rowcnt = rowCount();
00316       double *colx = cols(it->colx);
00317       double *coly = NULL;
00318       if(it->coly1 >= 0) coly = cols(it->coly1);
00319       if(it->coly2 >= 0) coly = cols(it->coly2);
00320       double *colweight = (it->colweight >= 0) ? cols(it->colweight) : NULL;
00321       double *colz = (it->colz >= 0) ? cols(it->colz) : NULL;
00322     
00323       if(colweight) {
00324           double weight_max = 0.0;
00325           for(int i = 0; i < rowcnt; i++)
00326                 weight_max = std::max(weight_max, colweight[i]);
00327           m_axisw->maxValue()->value(weight_max);
00328           m_axisw->minValue()->value(-0.4*weight_max);
00329       }
00330             
00331       std::deque<XGraph::ValPoint> &points_plot(it->xyplot->points());
00332       points_plot.clear();
00333       for(int i = 0; i < rowcnt; i++)
00334         {
00335           double z = 0.0;
00336           if(colz)
00337             z = colz[i];
00338           if(colweight) {
00339             if(colweight[i] > 0)
00340                points_plot.push_back( XGraph::ValPoint(colx[i], coly[i], z, colweight[i]) );
00341           }
00342           else
00343                points_plot.push_back( XGraph::ValPoint(colx[i], coly[i], z) );
00344         }
00345     }
00346     m_graph->requestUpdate();
00347   }
00348 }
00349 
00350 unsigned int
00351 XWaveNGraph::rowCount() const {return m_colcnt ? m_cols.size() / m_colcnt : 0;}
00352 unsigned int
00353 XWaveNGraph::colCount() const {return m_colcnt;}
00354 double *
00355 XWaveNGraph::cols(unsigned int n) {return &(m_cols[rowCount() * n]);}
